# huggingface Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "huggingface" {
  hf_token = "<YOUR_HF_TOKEN>"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `hf_token` (String, Sensitive) Hugging face token from the Access Token section
